title: missing methods "SKMatrix.mapRect/mapPoints/mapVectors"
body:
hi!
these methods are missing in SkiaSharp.SKMatrix:

`
bool SkMatrix::mapRect(SkRect* dst, const SkRect& src) 
void SkMatrix::mapVectors(SkPoint dst[], const SkPoint src[], int count)
void SkMatrix::mapPoints(SkPoint dst[], const SkPoint src[], int count)
`

which would be really really handy.
see: https://github.com/google/skia/blob/master/src/core/SkMatrix.cpp
and: https://github.com/google/skia/blob/78d58d1084f0390c1c0f9123ac6e48efcd226f39/include/core/SkMatrix.h
I am using 1.49.4-beta

comments.author: gentledepp
